layout.name: noMove
layout.title: Doesn't Move
layout.tooltip: Uncheck to give the Huckit Crab recoil from throwing its projectiles.

layout.name: throwRock
layout.title: Throws Rocks
layout.tooltip: Uncheck to make it throw sand balls instead of rocks.

layout.name: projGrav
layout.title: Projectile Gravity
layout.tooltip: Uncheck to have the projectile bounce along the ground rather than float straight ahead.

layout.name: xSpeed
layout.title: Projectile X Speed
layout.tooltip: X speed of the thrown projectile.

layout.name: ySpeed
layout.title: Projectile Y Speed
layout.tooltip: Y speed of the thrown projectile.

layout.name: delay
layout.title: Throw Delay
layout.tooltip: The delay in which the Huckit Crab throws its projectile.
